articles.title: Coronavirus found in men's semen - CNN
articles.description: Coronavirus can be found in the semen of men infected with the virus, Chinese researchers reported in a study that raises the question of sexual transmission.
articles.content:
(CNN)The new coronavirus can persist in men's semen even after they have begun to recover, a finding that raises the possibility the virus could be sexually transmitted, Chinese researchers said Thursday.

articles.title: Pandemics have 2 endings, says historians - Yahoo News
articles.description: When will the COVID-19 pandemic end? And how? According to historians, pandemics typically have two types of endings: the medical, which occurs when the inci...
articles.content: When will the COVID-19 pandemic end? And how? According to historians, pandemics typically have two types of endings: the medical, which occurs when the incidence and death rates plummet, and the social, when the epidemic of fear about the disease wanes.
